Flights of Artemis

Flights of Artemis

Artemis of the golden reins, grant me the sureness of your arrows!

"Flights of Artemis" ability
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Flights of Artemis

90
Hero ability
Duration:45 seconds
Target:

Self

Rage cost:50
Effects:

+50% Missile Damage

+25% Speed

Happiness
+20 to growth in the local province

Artisanship

Formation Specialist
